name: Die Insel
overview: It is the year 2049. An anonymous demand is relayed to the world's media stations making huge demands on the population of the United States and the Soviet Union, If his demands are not met, he will destroy the earth. All the intelligence agencies in the world were trying to locate the place from which the message had been sent. A German team of researchers succeeded shortly before the end of the ultimatum to learn the approximate location of the terrorist. However, it was thought to be too late to intervene in his plans. However, at the last second, fourteen people managed to leave Earth with an ancient spaceship before the explosive end. Due to the tremendous pressure, the spaceship was thrown out into a time-space vortex and landed in another time time. Professor Schmidt, a German teacher, was selected to travel back to the year 2049 to find the unknown offender, to prevent him from carrying out his evil deed. You are now taking on the role of Professor Schmidt. Try to find the victim's lair and prevent the worst from happening.
